title: JAVA Webdeveloper m/f/x
body:
Einleitung

ilogs information logistics GmbH is successfully developing modern eCommerce and business process applications since more than 18 years.

To support our professional team, we are looking for a

JAVA WEBDEVELOPER m/f/x

If you are willing to work in a young and dynamic team and your are comfortable with the following technologies:

  • JAVA EE, JAVA Servlet,
  • JAVAscript / JQuery
  • JPA, JSF2 / Primefaces
  • (X)HTML
  • Relational databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, MS SQL
  • knowledge about Android and/or iOS development environments are optional

Your profile

  • Very good knowledge of the described technologies

  • German or good English skills
  • Excellent problem-solving skills
  • Comfort with agile operation models
  • You see beyond the end of your nose, you are innovative and looking for a demanding

  • task in an internationally operating team

We offer

  • An international team of specialists, who guide you through the process of getting acquainted with our systems and projects, as well as through your personal and professional growth
  • Participation in international customer projects
  • A friendly and passionate working environment
  • An open working space that encourages interaction among team-mates

Minimum gross salary: â‚¬ 3.048,00.-, 14-times a year. Depending to your professional experience and educational skill a higher salary is possible.

We kindly looking forward to your application!

ilogs, information logistics GmbH, www.ilogs.com
Contakt: CTO: DI Christoph Bernhofer / Administration: Christina Hild
Email: office@ilogs.com
